question.table: @0$info_text:the socket am2, renamed from socket m2 (to prevent using the same name as cyrix mii processors), is a cpu socket designed by amd for desktop processors.# @1$info_text:socket am3 is a cpu socket for amd processors. it follows directly from socket am2+. am3 was launched on february 9th, 2009, alongside the initial grouping of phenom ii processors designed for it#
question.answer: The difference is the same as table
